front.title: IEEE Standard for Design and Verification of Low-Power, Energy-Aware Electronic Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A method is provided for specifying power intent for an electronic design, for use in verification of the structure and behavior of the design in the context of a given power management architecture, and for driving implementation of that power-management architecture. The method supports incremental refinement of power intent specifications required for IP-based design flows.(The PDF of this standard is available to you at no cost thru the IEEE GET program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=80).
